api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

carboncopy.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses to send a copy of all mailings to upon send

get_unsubscribe_reason.description: Whether or not to ask for reason when unsubscribing. Examples: 1 = yes, 0 = no

p_use_captcha.description: Whether or not to require CAPTCHA ("enter text on image" field) for this list. Examples: 1 = yes, 0 = no

require_name.description: Whether or not to require name with email when subscribing. Examples: 1 = yes, 0 = no

send_last_broadcast.description: Whether or not to send the last broadcast campaign when subscribing. Examples: 1 = yes, 0 = no

sender_reminder.description: Remind your contacts why they are on this list and why you are emailing them

sender_zip.description: Physical mailing address: zip or postal code

subscription_notify.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses to notify on new subscriptions to this list

to_name.description: If contact doesn't enter a name, use this. Example: 'Recipient'

unsubscription_notify.description: Comma-separated list of email addresses to notify on any unsubscriptions from this list
